casebody.data:
No. 1544,

Misc.

In re Burrus et al. Jack Greenberg and Michael Meltsner for petitioners. Robert Morgan, Attorney General of North Carolina, Ralph Moody, Deputy Attorney General, and Andrew A. Vañore, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, in opposition.

Sup. Ct. N. C. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted and case transferred to appellate docket.
